name: Nuphar luteum
Relationship: Compare, in sexual weakness; AGNUS; KALI-BROM.; LYCOP.; SELEN.; YOHIMBINE. In diarrhoea: CHELID.; GAMBOGE.; SULPH.; NYMPH OEA ODORATA - Sweet Water Lily - (early morning diarrhoea, backache); acrid leucorrhoea, offensive ulcers; bronchorrhea; ulcerative sore throat.)

Stool: Yellow diarrhoea; worse in the morning
Male: Complete absence of sexual desire; parts relaxed; penis retracted
Impotency, with involuntary emissions during stool, when urinating

details: Produces nervous weakness, with marked symptoms in the sexual sphere.
